entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Huntingdon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %

Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
